name: Touhou - Fortune Days (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Meiling is concerned about her weekly fortune, particularly the role Sakuya plays in it.

name: If I Were a Dictator
nutshell: A conversation between two high school girls, and the iron ambition one of them has.

name: "Kyodaika" Shite Gyaku ni Taido ga Chisaku Naru Gal
Tochinoki Nodoka no Idol Nichijou
nutshell: The story of a 16-year-old girl who dreams of becoming a major idol.

name: Taiyou Shounen Jango
nutshell:
Four immortal creatures threaten causing that the Dark is hung over the world. In the darkness, terrible creatures at night have begun to attack the people, incapable to defend themselves… until it appears Jango, a young vampire hunter that will ally with a beautiful girl and the spirit of the sun to defeat the forces of the dark.
Based on Konami's Boktai game.

name: Your Majesty Is So Handsome (Promo)
nutshell:
I woke up in this new world as Diana Gundal, the youngest daughter of a feudal lord. But hey, that’s great news! That means I can live my life pampered from head to toe right?
Wrong! Everyday I’m living like a maid to help out with the household. What’s even worse is that I neither inherited the old Diana’s memories nor her knowledge of the language. I’m basically starting from scratch… I thought I would live the rest of my life like this until the Emperor came to visit our small village.
BOOM! Oh lord, he is so handsome! I’m now so thankful I’m living under the same sky as him. I will work hard to get closer to him as his new number one fan!

name: Amulet of Destiny
nutshell:
Yechuan Su is a skilled young man who lives a carefree life, but he has no memory of his past
His world suddenly shatters after the murder of his adoptive father, and his loved one's betrayal
As he begins to recall his lost memories, he embarks on a journey seeking sweet revenge!

name: Sekai wa Bokura no Tameni!
nutshell:
Ogawa Maho is a young, fresh teacher who just arrived in Tokyo to take on a new teaching position at a high school there. Things donâ€™t go as she planned, however, when she breaks up with her boyfriend whom she had been dating for 6 years. Distraught over her breakup, Maho has a one-night stand with a guy she meets on the street. The encounter was memorable and manages to cheer Maho up enough so that she can face her new job and move on with her life. Of course she is shocked when she discovers that the random guy she spent the night with happens to be one of the students in her new class!
Contains the following one shots:
ch. 4: Currently Indulging in Love
Fukami Tadashi-san's twin brother, Katsura (who's nothing like his brother), has already investigated his brother's date and he has decided she is inappropriate for him. They break it off, but Tadashi is depressed so Katsura finds her again and begs her to get back together with his brother. What's going to happen?
ch. 4.5: Come Over to My House (Christmas Special)
Akiyama Riho's parents have passed away and she is currently living with the Suga family. She is dating the second son of the family but her love life there is full of obstacles..
ch. 9: Touching Lies With Lips
Nishihara Kimi's father is accused and arrested for a crime he did not do. She goes looking for a lawyer and Ehara Shirou, her ex-boyfriend, is the one she finds most capable to handle the case. He is an expensive lawyer but she's willing to do anything…

name: Kukkoro-chan and the Shota Prince
nutshell:
The story of both a female knight who, when captured by the enemy country, declared "Kill me", and an adorably radiant prince.
A wholesome tale.

name: Inugami Mokkosu
nutshell: Due to his inability to show any emotion and his peculiar sense of rationale, Inugami could never make many friends nor could he ever find his niche. He would always sit alone, eating his lunch under a tree by himself. Even when graduating high school and joining a university, it almost seemed like he would continue his past trend. Out of the blue, he was invited to join the Theater Study Club. There, he would find his first ever comrades, but will they be able to handle his odd nature?

name: Aru Asa
nutshell:
A dialogue-less story about a boy and a girl.
Entry of the Silent Manga Audition.

name: Urban Fairy King
tags: Action,Long Strip,Martial Arts,School Life,Web Comic,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell: Bai Li Yun Xiao - with a spiritual life in the continent Jiuxiao. After his death he was resurrected, however, he returned 300 years ago, returned to urban adolescence, changed his life, and climbed to the top of the world again. "Whether in heaven or on earth, only I can win"

name: God's in His Heaven
nutshell:
Mangaupdates:
Misaki's parents are dead, and she lives with her sick uncle, who is now hospitalized, while taking care of her younger sister. Her younger sister notices the family drama around them and feels scared of what is to come. Misaki simply lives, always hoping for the best.
A nice, full color oneshot that is somewhat sad.

name: Scientia
nutshell: A society where people have forgotten about ethical taboos and enjoy a life with clones, robots, body rental and drugs.

name: Occult Club - Normanda the Medium's Phone
nutshell: Onehot from Crew 1994

name: Touhou Project - The Family We Make (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A fan-interpretation of Mystia Lorelei's backstory from Touhou Project.

name: 09Summer
nutshell:
Gentlemen, I think we need to go wider. More Ume-sensei is always a good thing.
Miyo-chan seems a bit sad, always spacing out and is feeling thirsty, making everyone around her worried a little. Yamato-kun is determined to know what happened.
Link:
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon

name: Striving for the Luxury Liner
nutshell: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

name: Terror Infinity
nutshell: Do you want to understand the meaning of life? Do you really want to live?

name: Touhou - Jinja Seikatsu + Neko (Doujinshi)
nutshell: One day Reimu decides to adopt a little kitten, and from then on the daily life at the Hakurei Shrine was changed. litte kitten day to day interaction with the resident of Gensokyo.

name: Rurouni Kenshin: Hokkaido-hen
nutshell:
It is the 16th year of the Meiji era. Five years have passed since Kenshin Himura stopped the uprising of Makoto Shishio. Though the flames of his budding revolution were extinguished, the scars left in its wake are still felt across Japan. Remnants of his group—though scattered—still exist. Some have found peace while others continue to fight.
After a remaining faction tried to revive the revolution, Shishio's old sword fell into the hands of Ashitarou Hasegawa, an orphan boy who has never known a home. The conflict also leaves both Aran Inoue, a 16-year-old half-Japanese, half-American boy, and a mercenary girl named Asahi Kubota with a hefty price to pay off, with nowhere else to go. But luckily for these individuals, the Kamiya dojo has always been a place to accept wanderers without prying into their pasts.
The three are keen to start fresh, so when two members of Asahi's former clan show up demanding her return, Asahi refuses and things start to get ugly. In the midst of the chaos, the clan members drop a package containing a picture of dojo proprieter Kaoru Kamiya's presumably deceased father and his location—Hakodate, Hokkaido. With only this information, the members of the Kamiya dojo embark on an adventure across the sea in the hopes of finding news about Kaoru's father and the reason he is being targeted.

Official Release:

Indonesian release by Elex Media as Samurai X: Hokkaido Arc (2022)

name: Our Torsos
nutshell: Collection of oneshots.

name: Wedding Theme
nutshell: "Wedding Theme" is a historical romance, the setting is same as that of the "Romance of The Three Kingdoms." This manga creates a entirely different image of Zhou Yu who is portrayed more as a bad guy in "Romance of The Three Kingdoms." But, Zhou Yu is dashing, handsome, and young when he meets the heroine of this manga…

name: Lian Ai 1/2
nutshell: The unassuming Meng Yixi had always quietly crushed on her school's god Xu Rui, but her feelings were never able to make any progress. Once, she happened to buy a bracelet that held the spirit of another girl, Gu Yanran! Since then, Meng Yixi's school life underwent enormous changes……

name: Super Combat Legend: Shine Tomorrow
nutshell: The story follows Tachibana Misaki, a 15-year-old girl who's bullied at school. In her quest to become stronger, she decides to enter the delinquent path, aiming for a shinny tomorrow.

name: Toujuushi Bestialious
nutshell:
A.D 70 The mightiest empire Rome started conquering the world. The whole Europe was havocked by Roman's foot. In Albion, in order to protect their homeland, the Bravest Wyvern fought a bloody battle against the invader…
The term Bestiarii (闘獣士) refers to those that fought against beasts, whether through voluntary combat or execution, during the Ancient Roman era. Bestiarius refers to a single Bestiarii.

Officially Published:

In Italian by Panini Comics under the Planet Manga imprint
In German by Egmont Manga
In Spanish by Milky Way Ediciones and Panini Comics México​
In Brazilian Portuguese by Panini Comics/Planet Mangá
In French by Kazé

name: Kono Yakuza, Toriko ni Shite Miseru!
nutshell: “Do you really think those cute little kisses will be enough to take me down?" Chikage, the son of a yakuza boss, is in love with his father’s second-in-command, Aizawa. In order to be close to Aizawa, Chikage wants to join the clan in the future, but both his father and Aizawa are fiercely opposed to the idea. But Chikage’s feelings towards Aizawa, who had cared for him and loved him since he was little, had long since turned to love…! He decides that he’s going to use his body and anything else he can to sway Aizawa over to his side!! When Chikage desperately tries to kiss him, Aizawa used his tongue to tease him sweetly and deeply, and then slid his hot and naughty hand into his pants…!?

name: Bizarre Love Triangle
nutshell: Yano Shiki, um garoto que só mostra um rosto. Minase Akiha, uma estudante transferida tranquila e reservada. Minase Haruka, o outro lado de Akiha. Esta é a sua bizarra história de amor, em que a distância entre eles é ilimitada / zero.

name: The Dark Myth
nutshell: A story of old myths, an ancient destiny, godly powers… And the young man who's expected to choose whether to be a saint or a devil while seemingly powerless against the forces that push him towards darkness.

name: Touhou - Mamange (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
In this beloved Touhou doujin web-comic, combining "Mama" and "Udonge" in the title, we follow the lives and daily struggles of Reisen Udongein Inaba raising her three children Kaguya, Eirin and Tewi.
The series ran from 2010-2014 and concluded after 14 chapters, plus a few spin-offs and standalone doujin books.
The first chapter of the sequel series "Mamange Eternal" was also released in 2014, but it was put on hold for 5 years until its ultimate reboot in 2019.
English translation by Danbooru : https://danbooru.donmai.us/pools/1368

name: Looking For a Better Boyfriend!
nutshell: "If i were to become a guy, then i would never make a girl cry!" Said Jun, who just had a break up with her boyfriend. "Then why not become one?" An old woman told Jun… which startled her
